entry.title: BIP0039: Final call
entry.summary: TREZOR and bitcoinj have implemented the current spec with TREZOR's wordlist, which is of interest to 100% of clients who expressed interest in bip39, according to slush. Additionally, Bits of Proof has also implemented this spec with TREZOR's wordlist and it has been deployed in two open-source projects, one of which is btc1k on their GitHub page. Tam√°s Blummer, founder of Bits of Proof, provided this information through his website bitsofproof.com.
